lead_paragraph: James Rackover, 25, and Lawrence Dilione, 28, are accused of killing Joseph Comunale, 26, in Manhattan, then burying his body on the Jersey Shore.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Kristin Hussey, Emily Palmer and Nick Madigan, and research by Susan C. Beachy.

headline.print_headline: 2 Charged With Murder After a Buried Body Is Found in New Jersey
headline.main: 2 Men Charged With Murder After Buried Body Is Found in New Jersey

snippet: James Rackover, 25, and Lawrence Dilione, 28, are accused of killing Joseph Comunale, 26, in Manhattan, then burying his body on the Jersey Shore....
abstract: James Rackover and Lawrence Dilione are charged with second-degree murder in connection with fatal stabbing of Joseph Comunale; police say they have recovered 32 pieces of evidence from Rackover's apartment, including blood-splattered clothing belonging to Comunale.
